instruction.instruction_text: Go down the hallway, go through the second open door on your left, and stop at the bed with the teddy bear.
Leave this room, go to the bathroom ahead and to your right, and stop directly in front of the sink.
Head down the hall, go into the first open door on your left, stop by the crib and recliner, and look out the window.
Go into the room across from you and stop by the shower curtain.
Go down the hall to the very end, then stop to the right of the bed in the bedroom.
Walk to about a meter to the left of the front of the kitchen counter, then wait for me.
Go all the way down the hallway and stop at the front-right of the potted plant and the big white cabinet, between the two lounge chairs.
Walk along the left wall, go through the third open door, and stop in front of the mirror.
Enter the hallway, go through the second door on your right, stop 1.5 meters in front of and to the left of the white cabinet, and wait for me.
Go out of this room, into the one across from it, and stop on the left side of the bed, between the lamp and the pile of stuff, and wait for me there.
Go through the hall, past the bathroom and shower, into the other bedroom, and wait for me on the right side of the bed.
Go through the corridor, turn right at the first door on your left, go into the door on your right, and stop directly in front of the black chair.
Go into the room on your left, stop by the bathtub and wait for me. You'll see some towels and a pot of flowers.
Go to the end of the hallway, stop between the grey sofa and the black sofa, and wait for me.
Walk down the hallway, turn right at the first door, go all the way to the back, and stop in front and to the left of the bookshelf.
Please go upstairs, head to the room directly across from the top of the stairs, and stop in front of the washing machine.
Please go up to the top floor, enter the study, and stop by the blue chair to wait for me.
Go to the room directly at the end of the corridor, and stop between the grey cabinet and the bed, facing the wooden cabinet.
Go through the hallway and the stairs, then stop just ahead and to the right of the dresser with a mirror and a vase to wait for me; straight ahead of you will be a blue bed and picture frames.
Cross the hallway, turn left at the first door on your left, and stop by the sink.
Walk out of this room, go to the room behind you, and stop by the computer desk.
Head up the stairs, walk to the room on your far right, and stop between the floor-to-ceiling window and the clothes rack.
Go up the stairs, then walk to the room on your right, which is directly across from the top of the stairs, and stop between the zebra and giraffe figures and the window.
Please walk along the left wall to the third open room, go inside, and stop at the foot of the bed.
Please go downstairs and wait for me between the table for six and the wooden cabinet, facing the window.
Please go all the way down the corridor to the end, and stop under the TV and next to the alphabet.
Please go down the hall to the third door, turn right, and wait for me at the bottom of the stairs in the room.
Please go all the way down the hallway and stop between the red and brown sofas to wait for me.
Please walk down the hall to the third door, turn left, stop in front of a pile of stuff, and look out the window.
Please go into the corridor, walk down to the second door on your right, turn right, and stop next to the toilet in the bathroom.
Please go upstairs and wait between the coffee machine and the wooden cabinet in the restaurant.
Walk to the end of the corridor, and wait for me between the black chair and the lamp.
Walk to the end of the hallway, stop by the bed, and the stairs will be right at your feet.
Please go straight, turn right at the third door on your right, and stop by the window and wait for me.
Please go straight, turn left at the second door on your left, and stop in the middle of the house to wait for me.
Please go to the second room on your right and stop in the center of the room.
Go straight down the hallway, turn right at the third door on your right, and stop between the vase and the bed.
Go down the hallway to the end, stop between the pool table and the paintings, and you'll see the sofa there.
Go down the hallway, take the second door on your right into the room, and stop by the bed to wait for me.
Please go upstairs, stop between the two chairs, facing the window, and wait for me.
Please go downstairs and stop one meter to the front left of the kitchen stove.
Go straight down the corridor, turn left at the second door on your left, and stop next to the potted plant.
Go through the hallway into the other room, and stop between the white and gray sofas, facing the window.
Please go to the next room you're facing, stop by the wall, and wait for me.
Walk through the hallway to the kitchen, and stand between the sink and the oven, facing the sink and dishes.
Please stick to the left wall, turn left at the third door on your left, enter the room, and wait for me by the mirror there.
Please leave this room, go to the one directly across from it, and stop between the table and the bed to wait for me.
Go down the stairs, through the corridor, and stop between the six-person table and the fireplace in the dining room, where we'll be having our meal.
Walk straight down the middle of the corridor, go into the room through the fourth door on your right, and stop in front of the mirror.
Go straight down the middle of the hall, take the second door on your right into the room, and stop between the green table and the window, where you'll have a full view of the room.
Please go to the living room and stand between the black and white sofas; from there, you'll be able to see the view outside through the window.
Leave the current room, follow the right-hand side until the very end, and stop in the garage between the blue and black trash cans, facing the garage door.
Please go up the stairs, walk through the hallway, head to the living room, and stop between the fireplace and the brown couch to wait for me.
Please go to the room behind you, stop by the computer desk and wait for me.
Please walk down the hall, keeping to the left wall, and go into the room through the fourth door on your left, stopping between the bed and the window.
Please leave this room, walk down the hall to the kitchen, stop between the stove and the sink, and face the window.
Please go downstairs to the third room counted from right to left and stop next to the printer.
Please go downstairs to the second room counted from right to left and stop at the center of the room.
Please go downstairs to the room on the far right in your field of vision and stop under the electric fan.
Please go straight down the hallway, through the second door on your right, and wait for me by the sink in the bathroom.

Follow the handrail downstairs into the corridor, then at the end of the corridor, go into the second room from the left, and stop right in the center of the room, between the cartoon wallpaper and the bed.
Please go to the room you're facing and stop right by the toilet and the shower curtain.
Walk along the wall on your right, turn right at the third door, and stop by the bed.
Please go through the leftmost door and stop by the bed.
Please exit the room, then go through the second door on your left. Walk a couple of steps inside and stop.
Go behind the sofa farthest from you and stop.
Please go up the stairs, go to the rightmost room you can get into, and stop by the bed.
Leave the room, then follow the right wall to the second room on your right. Walk a few more steps inside and stop.
Go all the way down the hallway to the end.
Please stop at the bottom of the stairs.
Please walk to the bedside in the room across from the all-white bedroom on the second floor and stop.
Stop by the window in the bedroom across from the en-suite which has a bathroom in it.
lease go to the front of the sofa, by the fireplace.
Please walk to the front of the fridge and stop.
Please go down through the hall to the end and stop at the foyer entrance.
Please go up the stairs, go into the room on the far left, and stop between the bed and the chair.
Follow the hallway on your right all the way to the end, then stop between the bed and the desk with the laptop.
Please walk behind the chair in this room and stop.
Please walk into the second room from the left, and stop to the left of the bed.
Please go upstairs, head into the third room on your right, and stop under the yellow light.
Please leave this room, go to the second room on your right, and stand in front of the mirror.
Please leave this room, go all the way down the hall, and stop right between the lamp and the bed.
Please leave this bedroom, head into the first room on your left, and stand to the left of the bathtub.
Please go all the way down the right-hand corridor and stop by the trash can.
Please go up the stairs, into the second room on your left, and stand under the fan.
Please walk down the hall and stop in front of the screen in the room at the end.
Please leave the room and stop at the top of the stairs.
Follow the left wall all the way to the oven in the kitchen.
Head inside, go down the hall to the end, and stop at the air vent.
Follow the wall and railing on your left until you get to the wooden table, right across from the bull's head carving.
Please go into the bedroom bathroom and stand in front of the sink and mirror.
Follow the wall on your left until you get to the beginning of the banister, then stop.
Please leave the room and stand outside by your nearest potted plant.
Please go to the middle room, the second one from the left, and wait by the wooden cabinet.
Go behind the bar and wait by the condiment bottles.
Go all the way to the end of the hall and stop.
Go into the first room on your left, take about two or three steps in from the door, and then stop.
Walk to the end of the hallway and stop between the sectional and the TV.
Walk down the hallway and stop between the brown cabinet and the four-person table.
Walk down the hall, take a right at the second room on your right, and stop in front of the mirror by the door.
Go down the hall, past a bunch of rooms and two doors, and it's to the left of the stationary bike.
Go stand right in front of the washing machine.
Go down the stairs and stop between the couch and the table.
Head down the hall and stop at the open door in the bedroom.
Walk down the hall, take the second door on your left, and stop between the potted plant and the bed.
Go through the first door on your right and stop at the doorway.
Walk through the hall and stop between the TV, the beige sofa, and the purple sofa.
Go to the second room counting from left to right, and wait me beside the bed.
Go into the first room on the left, go through a door inside, and stop at the big table.
Go out of this room, into the one across from the laundry room, and stop by the blinds.
Get out of this room, head into the second one from the left, and wait for me next to the bed.
Wait for me by the nearest kitchen stove.
Walk down the hall and stop behind the white chairs at the eight-seater table.
Go to the farthest room on your right that you can see, and stop between the bed and the mirror.
Go upstairs, and wait for me under the fan in the first room on your right.
Could you please go to the second room from the right, and once you're inside, wait for me in front of the bathroom glass.
Leave this room, go into the second one from the right, and wait at the doorside.
Head into the leftmost room and wait for me by the crib.
Please go upstairs to the second floor and wait for me in the third room from the right.
Please go to the room to the left of the stairs and wait by the double bed.
Please go downstairs and wait for me in the kitchen, between the fridge and the square marble table.
Please wait for me right up against the front of the huge red sofa.
Wait for me by the stairs, between the grey sofa and the coffee table.
Go into the leftmost room a few steps and stop
Please go to the room across from the cloakroom and stop at the door.
Wait for me in the bedroom, in the area between the couch and the bed.
Go to the end of the hall and stop by the white and brown sofas near the window.
Head towards the microwave oven on the kitchen wall and stop in front of the kitchen microwave oven.
Go into the room to the right of the wooden door in the hallway and wait for me right there, between the couch, TV, and window.
Keep walking along the left wall, go through the second open door, and stop between the teddy bear and the TV.
Head to the room on your left and stop in front of the washer.
Please turn left at the first door on your left and stop in front of the white armchair.
Go straight down the hall until you hit the intersection.
Go straight down the hall and stop by the window.
Follow the handrail and stop between the mirror and the toilet.
Go wait by the microwave at the kitchen counter.
Go downstairs and wait at the door of the leftmost room.
Step out of the messy room and stop between the TV, the wooden table, and the lamp.
Go through the hallway, past the messy pots and pans in the kitchen, and stop by the wall right next to the microwave.
Head down the hall and stand right in front of the solid wood bookshelf by the window.
Go into the room right in front of you and stop in the middle of the room.
Walk down the hall and stop at door of Room 118.
Turn left, head down the hall to Room 122, and stop between the two beds inside.
Leave this room and wait for me outside room 115.
Head left, and please wait for me at the third door on the right.
Head straight to the fourth door on your left and wait for me.
Go straight ahead to the second door on your left and wait for me.
Turn around, knock on Room 113's door, and wait for me.
Please wait for me between the two elevators.
Go stand directly in front of the TV, right next to the sofa.
Go into the room on your right and stop between the two white cabinets.
Go into the room on your right and wait by the grey bed.
Go straight down the hall to the very end, and it's the first small room on your right.
Go down the stairs, stop right in front of the tan couch, and face the corner of the wall.
Leave this room, go into the hallway, enter the second room on your left, and stop by the bed.
Walk to the room across from you and stop in front of the mirror.
Walk over and stop between the fireplace and the wooden cabinet.
Keep walking along the wall on your right until you get to the toilet and sink.
Please step out of the room, walk over to the standalone grey chair, and lean your back against the glass railing.
Please go into the first room on your right and stop in front of the painting.
Go all the way to the end of the hall.
Turn right at the second door on your right, enter the room, and stand between the two beds, facing the nightstand.
Leave the room, then go between the TV and the coffee table, and you'll be by the potted plant.
Pass between the two pillars and stop between the two windows.
Head down the left corridor, take the first door on your left, then go into the bathroom in that room and stand in front of the mirror.
Go through the glass door between two curtains, stop by the bed, and face the owl pillow.
Leave this room, go into the one on your right, and stop by the bed.
Go to the room all the way on the right, and stand between the wooden table and chairs, with your back to the bed.
Go to the second room from the right, enter the empty hardwood-floored room inside, and wait for me in the middle.
Go downstairs and look for the washing machine and the overhead light near the stairs, then stand right in front of the washing machine, under the light.
Go downstairs and wait for me in the kitchen, at the L-shaped counter in front of the stove.
Go through the space between the microwave and the kitchen counter, then stop at the end of the hall.
Go straight ahead to the middle of the room with the TV, next to the two sofas.
Please go upstairs, go through the door on your left, pass through the opening in the railing, and stop between the two sofas.
Walk and stop between the table and the door. You are facing the wooden handrails.
Walk over and stop between the two wall TVs.
Go into the server room right across the hall, beneath the sign that says 'AND'.
Walk from the middle of the hall all the way to the end and stop.
Go stand in the living room, between the fireplace and the glass panel, facing the sofa, and wait for me.
Please turn left at the second door on your left, go into the nearest room and stop at the doorway.
Please go wait for me by the bed in the room on the left.
Please go through the living room and stand between the stove and the table.
Go down the hall, turn left at the first door, and wait by the shelves.
Please go into the living room and wait for me in the dead center.
Please turn right at the second door on your right, and stop in the spot between the bed, the table lamp, and the curtains in the room.
Get out of this room, head into the walk-in closet in the room to your left, and stop under the clothes rack.
Leave the room, walk straight down the hall, and stop where the sofa meets the banister.
Past the stairs, through the door, wait for me in the middle of the short hall.
Go through the hall and wait for me by the red and white checkered painting.
Go into the hallway, stick to the left wall, turn left at the third open door, and stop between the lounge chair and the bed.
Leave the room, go down the hall and through the glass door, then stop at the main exit.
Stop between the gray sofa and the table in the living room.
Go down the hall and stop by the tent.
Find the hallway with three rooms, and stop in the middle to wait for me.
Go to the bedroom closet and wait for me by the hangers.
Walk down the hall and wait for me by the llama painting and the bamboo chair.
Go wait for me between the foosball table and the TV.
Go through the living room and you'll find it in the corner, next to a silver pipe and a 'Maple' flag.
Go through the second door on your left, walk between the table and the bed, and wait for me by the nightstand.
Go to the end of the hall, head up the stairs, and stop between the bathroom mirror and the door.
Walk to the room across from mine, and stop in front of the sofa, by the pillar.
Walk to the room on your right, and stop by the towel.
Follow the right wall all the way to the end and stop by the double bed.
Please come to the front of the microwave, right next to the range hood, by the corner.
Come stand in front of the living room couch, facing the TV and the coffee table.
Wait for me down the hall by the potted plant next to the white wall.
Go to the room across from this one, stop in the center, right by the exercise equipment.
Walk past the banister to the room across the hall, stopping by the mirror and wooden cabinet, with the foot of the bed on your left.
Go through the second door from the right, and go all the way to the back of the room.
Go down the hall, first room on your left, and wait for me in front of the mirror.
Go down the stairs and wait for me by the kitchen sink, near the L-shaped corner.
Walk down the hall and wait for me in the garage between the ladder and the window.
